title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, satin, knot, four-sided, chain, cross, buttonhole, reflected element work, and withdrawn element work on plain weave foundation
description: Long horizontal sampler with vertical stripes of floral pattern, spot motifs, alphabet and numerals.  Bound with yellow silk ribbon.
name: Sampler
